title: [Large-scale] Web-based Blended Learning for Enhancing Mathematical Job Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts and Practical Application Experience
context.additional_context: Implementing blended learning designs in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply mathematical concepts with over 80% accuracy in solving real-life problems through VR simulations.
Post-intervention assessments demonstrate statistically significant academic achievement improvement at a 0.01 significance level compared to pre-intervention assessments.
The course concludes with an average learner satisfaction survey score of 4.5/5 or higher.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
